frame_id.description: Frame of reference for the image. The origin of the frame is the optical center of the camera. +x points to the right in the image, +y points down, and +z points into the plane of the image.

format.description:
Image format

Supported values: `webp`, `jpeg`, `png`, `zfp`

For ZFP compression, only 2D fields are supported and the data must be prefixed with a full ZFP header (`ZFP_HEADER_FULL`).
